name: 2D-Shooter (BilalSaqib19)
description:
Proposed modifications

I'd like to implement 3 stages. Stage 1 being more a standard enemies around the stage. Stage 2 will be mostly chaser enemies while you have to not get caught in the horde of them. Stage 3 will be a boss fight. 

Stage 3 will have it's own theme as well. 

I will also try to create power-ups through out the game.
